abstract: Creates a vector from the specified row of the matrix.

declaration.code: func la_vector_from_matrix_row(_ matrix: la_object_t, _ matrix_row: la_count_t) -> la_object_t

overview:
## Return Value

The resulting vector is a 1 x cols(matrix) vector.

### Parameters

Creates a vector from the specified row of the matrix.  If the value for matrix_row is less than zero or greater than rows(matrix)-1, [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/LA_INVALID_PARAMETER_ERROR] is returned.

If matrix is a splat, [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/LA_INVALID_PARAMETER_ERROR] is returned.

Always returns a 1 x vector_length vector.

# la_vector_from_matrix_row(_:_:)

**Function**

Creates a vector from the specified row of the matrix.

## Declaration

```swift
func la_vector_from_matrix_row(_ matrix: la_object_t, _ matrix_row: la_count_t) -> la_object_t
```

## Return Value

The resulting vector is a 1 x cols(matrix) vector.

### Parameters



Creates a vector from the specified row of the matrix.  If the value for matrix_row is less than zero or greater than rows(matrix)-1, [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/LA_INVALID_PARAMETER_ERROR] is returned.

If matrix is a splat, [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/LA_INVALID_PARAMETER_ERROR] is returned.

Always returns a 1 x vector_length vector.
